text:
Aria was at MMS presenting and asked roughly the same question there - it sounds
like they have a lot of internal logging and troubleshooting, and want to make
that public (along with error codes and potentially diagnostics). 
I'd expect the suggestions to eventually make their way into something public,
but ymmv. 
Collin

RE: Do you look at update logs? 
You don't often get email from collin.corrion@gmail.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Aria was at MMS presenting and asked roughly the same question there - it sounds
like they have a lot of internal logging and troubleshooting, and want to make
that public (along with error codes and potentially diagnostics). 
I'd expect the suggestions to eventually make their way into something public,
but ymmv. 
Collin
